text: Bernard Deconinck (26 April 1936 â€“ 15 April 2020) was a French track cyclist. He was born in Lille. He won a silver medal in the amateur motor-paced racing at the 1959 World Championships in Amsterdam. He became professional in 1960. Deconinck died on 15 April 2020 in Cavaillon. He was 83. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1936 births Category:2020 deaths Category:French cyclists Category:People from Lille Category:Sportspeople from Hauts-de-France
title: Bernard Deconinck
